title: Bug 122068[Smoke][Regression]Exception thrown out when preview Chart
description: Bug 122068[Smoke][Regression]Exception thrown out when preview Chart
OB: Though the chart image is generated, a ClassCastException is thrown out. The handle here actually is an ExtendedItemHandle, not an ImageHandle.There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Chart : 580Error0 : Error.UnhandledScriptError ( 1 time(s) )detail :
